title: Problem-Based Case Review Training to Strengthen Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmaceutical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Language (communication) competency enhancement training for in-service professionals, fostering practical application skills through collaborative case studies with diverse experts.

learning_goals: Learners can establish patient treatment plans with 80% accuracy by analyzing interdisciplinary collaboration cases in a simulation/VR environment.
Learners improve their ability to apply pharmaceutical knowledge to clinical situations by over 75% through problem-based case reviews.
Learners demonstrate improved learning outcomes with scores enhanced by at least 15% through assessment tools (quizzes/simulations).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
